attributes.action: Allow men to go into scans and appointments with their pregnant partner!
attributes.additional_details: Why are pubs allowed to re open yet men aren’t allowed to go into health care appointments with their pregnant partner!
attributes.background: Allow men to be able to go into a scan/midwife appointment with their partner.

rejection.details:
Individual hospitals and clinics, not the UK Government or House of Commons, decide who can attend scans and antenatal appointments. 

You should check with your maternity team and sonography unit for their policy on who can attend antenatal appointments, including scans.
